dict.acceptation: 使高兴；使满意；讨人喜欢；讨好；

sent.orig: Please look at all and if you have any questions ask before bidding.
sent.trans: Please其他物品，如果您有任何问题，才招投标要求。

sent.orig: Please wait for my invoice before paying to receive multiple item discount!
sent.trans: Please等待我的发票付款前收到多个项目的优惠！

sent.orig: Please be aware that I used the same photo to list in multiple sizes.
sent.trans: Please知道，我用同样的照片在多个大小的列表。

sent.orig: PLEASE NOTE: are only bidding the nonstick mold set which are from House of Lloyd.
sent.trans: PLEASE注意：你只对不粘模具一套由众议院劳埃德的出价。

sent.orig: Please inquire before bidding or buying.
